install-dependencies.command: echo "Setting up config for local Cassandra...";cp /workspace/httpie-katapod/assets/config-cassandra.json /home/gitpod/.config/httpie/config.json

admin.command: HOME=/root sudo /home/gitpod/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics key=$GITPOD_INSTANCE_ID path=astra date=`date +%s`
HOME=/root sudo /home/gitpod/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics key=$GITPOD_INSTANCE_ID path=cassandra date=`date +%s`
HOME=/root sudo /home/gitpod/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/emails email=$GITPOD_GIT_USER_EMAIL path=astra date=`date +%s`
HOME=/root sudo /home/gitpod/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics email=$GITPOD_GIT_USER_EMAIL path=cassandra date=`date +%s`
